inclusion.criterion: Participant is healthy, as determined by medical history and physical examination.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Participant is at least 3 years of age but not yet 6 years of age at the enrolment.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: For the TetraMenD group: received one dose of TetraMenD as a participant in trial 603-02 no less than 18 months prior to enrolment.
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Parent/Guardian has signed Institutional Review Board- (IRB-) approved informed consent form.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Serious chronic disease (i.e., cardiac, renal, neurologic, metabolic, rheumatologic, psychiatric etc.)
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Known or suspected impairment of immunologic function
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient has high blood pressure and signs of septicemia, but is otherwise healthy. He has been previously vaccinated with meningococcal group ACWY conjugate vaccine and meningococcal group B vaccine.
